00001 /*************
00002  *
00003  *  Name:      aaglobal.h
00004  *
00005  *  Purpose:   Include file for typedefs required in the Sierra
00006  *             Wireless portion of the system. Third party code
00007  *             may not follow this standard.
00008  *
00009  *  Note:      These definitions are for use in the internal
00010  *             portion of the API. The definitions used by the public
00011  *             part are defined separately.
00012  *
00013  *             Do not add any definitions to this file. All new definitions
00014  *             should go into SwiDataTypes.h
00015  *
00016  * Copyright: Â© 2011 Sierra Wireless Inc., all rights reserved
00017  *
00018  **************/
00019 
00020 #ifndef aaglobal_h
00021 #define aaglobal_h
00022 
00023 /* Note: This file contains all global definitions that are also available
00024  * to the Application
00025  */
00026 
00027 typedef unsigned char      swi_uint8;   /* 8  bit integer unsigned  */
00028 typedef unsigned short     swi_uint16;  /* 16 bit integer unsigned  */
00029 typedef unsigned long      swi_uint32;  /* 32 bit integer unsigned  */
00030 typedef unsigned long long swi_uint64;  /* 64 bit integer unsigned  */
00031 
00032 typedef signed char        swi_int8;    /* 8  bit integer signed    */
00033 typedef signed short       swi_int16;   /* 16 bit integer signed    */
00034 typedef signed long        swi_int32;   /* 32 bit integer signed    */
00035 typedef signed long long   swi_int64;   /* 64 bit integer signed    */
00036 
00037 typedef int swi_bool;    /* boolean type used for true/false. should only be
00038                           * tested for zero or non-zero
00039                           */
00040 
00041 typedef char swi_char, *swi_charp;  /* char type */
00042 
00050 typedef unsigned long   swi_size_t;
00051 
00059 typedef long    swi_ssize_t;
00060 
00066 typedef unsigned short  swi_UCS2;
00067 typedef swi_UCS2        *swi_UCS2p;
00068 
00069 /* Alignment operators */
00070 #define ALIGN4 (sizeof(swi_uint32) -1)
00071 #define ALIGN2 (sizeof(swi_uint16) -1)
00072 
00078 #define UNUSEDPARAM( x ) (void)x
00079 
00080 /* function and variable scope modifiers */
00081 #define local static  /* function/variable accessed within local file only */
00082 #define package       /* accessable within package only, used for fns only */
00083 #define global        /* function accessed globally, used for functions only */
00084 
00085 /* note: currently package and global are only used manually,
00086  * someday tools should make use of these indentifiers
00087  * ie. prototype generation tools
00088  */
00089 
00090 #define UTF8_MAX_CHAR_SIZE 4
00091 
00092 #define YES 1
00093 #define NO 0
00094 
00095 #define FALSE 0
00096 #define TRUE !FALSE
00097 #define EOS '\0'
00098 
00099 #ifndef NULL
00100 #define NULL ((void *)0)
00101 #endif
00102 
00103 #endif /* aaglobal.h */
